adventure_overview: Getting outside is a fun part of being a Cub Scout . Using technology outdoors can be an important part of helping you explore the world around you . Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.
